name: Managed Service for PostgreSQL — Cluster overview

targets.query: alias(series_sum("name", "pooler-xact_count"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", resource_type="cluster", host="{{hostname}}", node="*"}), "Transactions")

top_max(5, alias(series_sum(as_vector("user", "database"), "pg_backend_read_bytes"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", host="{{hostname}}", resource_type="cluster", backend_type="client_backend", node="*"}), "{{backend_type}}_{{user}}_{{database}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("backend_type", "pg_backend_read_bytes"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", host="{{hostname}}", resource_type="cluster", backend_type!="client_backend", node="*"}), "{{backend_type}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("backend_type", "pg_backend_write_bytes"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", host="{{hostname}}", node="*", resource_type="cluster", backend_type!="client_backend"}), "{{backend_type}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum(as_vector("user", "database"), "pg_backend_write_bytes"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", host="{{hostname}}", node="*", resource_type="cluster", backend_type="client_backend"}), "{{backend_type}}_{{user}}_{{database}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("backend_type", "pg_backend_cpu"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", host="{{hostname}}", resource_id="{{cluster}}", node="*", backend_type!="client_backend"}), "{{backend_type}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum(as_vector("user", "database"), "pg_backend_cpu"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", host="{{hostname}}", resource_id="{{cluster}}", node="*", backend_type="client_backend", resource_type="cluster"}), "{{backend_type}}_{{user}}_{{database}}"))

top_max(5, alias("postgres_wait_event**"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", host="{{hostname}}", resource_type="cluster", node="*", query_type!="-", database="*"}, "{{query_type}}"))
alias(series_sum("disk.free_bytes"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", node="primary", resource_type="cluster", host="*"}), "Disk free")
alias(series_sum("disk.used_bytes"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", resource_type="cluster", node="primary", host="*"}), "Disk used")

alias(series_avg("pooler-avg_xact_time"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", host="{{hostname}}", resource_id="{{cluster}}", resource_type="cluster", node="*"}), "Average Transaction Time")

alias(series_avg("pooler-avg_query_time"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_type="cluster", resource_id="{{cluster}}", host="{{hostname}}", node="*"}), "Average Statement Time")
alias(series_avg("systag", "cpu*"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", host="{{hostname}}", resource_id="{{cluster}}", node="*", resource_type="cluster", systag="*"}), "{{systag}}")
alias(series_sum("postgres-log_errors"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", host="{{hostname}}", node="*", resource_type="cluster"}), "Log Errors")
alias(series_sum("disk.temp_files_size"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", host="{{hostname}}", resource_type="cluster", node="*"}), "Temp Files")
alias(series_sum("disk.wal_size"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", resource_id="{{cluster}}", host="{{hostname}}", resource_type="cluster", node="*"}), "WAL size")

alias(series_sum("pooler-total_tcp_connections"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", host="{{hostname}}", resource_id="{{cluster}}", resource_type="cluster", node="*"}), "TCP connections")

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("dbname", "_pg_database_size"{folderId="{{folderId}}", service="managed-postgresql", node="primary", resource_id="{{cluster}}", resource_type="cluster", dbname="*"}), "{{dbname}} disk usage"))
